title: Kinetic Green expects its turnover to treble to about Rs 1,000 crore in next fiscal
description: Sulajja Firodia Motwani, founder of the Pune-based company, said there has been a “dramatic transformation” in consumer preference for electric vehicles over the last few months, a lot of which can be attributed to the revision in incentives under the FAME (faster adoption and manufacturing of electric and hybrid vehicles) II policy.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
